output.input_text:
MRI Right Knee without ContrastPost-traumatic knee pain, rule out ligament injuryFindings:
Bones: No fracture or marrow edema.
Menisci: Horizontal tear in the posterior horn of the medial meniscus.
Ligaments: Partial tear of the anterior cruciate ligament (ACL). Posterior cruciate ligament (PCL), medial collateral ligament (MCL), and lateral collateral ligament (LCL) are intact.
Cartilage: Focal thinning of the medial femoral condyle cartilage.
Joint Effusion: Mild joint effusion without loose bodies.

Impression:
Horizontal tear of the medial meniscus posterior horn.
Partial ACL tear.
Mild joint effusion.

or marrow edema. Menisci : Horizontal tear in the posterior horn of the medial meniscus. Ligaments : Part
